#MASTER-LIST OF MOBS. MAPS ATTRIBUTES TO MOBS THAT ARE USED TO POPULATE MAPS#
#Attributes are dynamic but must include 'image','tileX','tileY', 'type'#
#Name of Mob<required space>Attributes formatted as standard dict#
oldMan {'image':'npc.png','tileX':1,'tileY':1,'type':'random'}
